message.description: Single channel RF data from a USRP, WIFI dongle, etc...
message.field: Companion computer time since boot (us)
RF sensor type. See RF_SENSOR_TYPE enum
Identifier of sensor that generated the data
Timestamp of sample
Magnitude
Phase
Frequency
Gain
Bandwith
Sample rate

message.field: Companion computer time since boot (us)
RF sensor type. See RF_SENSOR_TYPE enum
Identifier of sensor that generated the data
Timestamp of sample
Magnitude
Phase
Frequency
Gain
Bandwith
Sample rate

message.name: MACHINE_VISION_FEEDBACK
message.description: Report frame capture of machine vision camera
message.field: System ID of companion computer
Companion computer time since boot (us)
Autopilot frame capture time (us)
Current frame number in processing sequence

message.name: ORB_SLAM_STATUS
message.field: Companion computer time since boot (us)
Current tracking state. See ORB_SLAM_TRACKING_STATE enum
Current frame number in processing sequence
Time taken to process the last frame
Number of tracked points in the last frame

message.name: CC_PROCESSING_STATUS
message.description: Reports processing status of companion computer
message.field: Companion computer time since boot (us)
Time used to generate average values (s)
Average system CPU usage rounded to the nearest whole percentage [0-100]
Average system GPU usage rounded to the nearest whole percentage [0-100]
Average system RAM usage rounded to the nearest whole percentage [0-100]
Average system SWAP usage rounded to the nearest whole percentage [0-100]

message.name: CC_NET_IF_STATUS
message.description: Reports status of a network interface
message.field: Companion computer time since boot (us)
Interface name e.g.: wlan0, eth0, lo, etc...
Interface status. See NET_IF_STATUS enum
Number of bytes sent on this interface
Number of bytes received on this interface
Number of packets sent on this interface
Number of packets received on this interface

message.name: CC_NET_IF_STATUS_EXTRA
message.description: Reports status of a network interface
message.field: Companion computer time since boot (us)
Interface name e.g.: wlan0, eth0, lo, etc...
Interface status. See NET_IF_STATUS enum
Total number of errors while receiving on this interface
Total number of errors while sending on this interface
Total number of dropped incoming packets on this interface
Total number of dropped outgoing packets on this interface

message.name: CC_DISK_CAPACITY
message.description: Reports disk usage at a path
message.field: Companion computer time since boot (us)
Path descriptor used to generate values
Total number of bytes for this path
Total number of used bytes for this path
Total number of free bytes for this path

message.name: CC_PROCESS_STATUS
message.description: Reports status and usage statistics for a process
message.field: Companion computer time since boot (us)
Name of the process
PID value of the process
Current process status. See PROCESS_STATUS enum
Time used to generate average values (seconds)
Average CPU usage by process rounded to the nearest whole percentage [0-100]
Average RAM usage by process rounded to the nearest whole percentage [0-100]
Average SWAP usage by process rounded to the nearest whole percentage [0-100]
Number of socket connections currently opened by this process
Number of file descriptors currently opened by this process
Number of files currently opened by this process
Number of threads currently opened by this process
Number of children processes currently opened by this process

message.name: CC_SIGNAL_PROCESS
message.description: Send a signal to a process running on a companion computer
message.field: target system ID
target component ID
Timestamp of the request (us)
target PID value of the process to send the signal
Signal to send to the process. See PROCESS_SIGNAL enum

message.name: CC_CPU_STATUS
message.description: Reports CPU status of companion computer
message.field: Companion computer time since boot (us)
Time used to generate average values (seconds)
Total number of CPU cores
ID of CPU measurements. 0:CPU No. 1-2, 1:CPU No. 3-4, etc...
Average system CPU usage reported per core rounded to the nearest whole percentage [0-100]
CPU frequency reported per core (MHz)
System CPU temperature reported per core (degrees celsius). -1 if not supported

message.name: CC_WIFI_IF_STATUS
message.description: Reports status of a wireless interface
message.field: Companion computer time since boot (us)
Interface name e.g.: wlan0, etc...
Wireless interface status. See NET_IF_STATUS enum
Interface operational mode. See WIFI_MODE enum
Number of active connections on the wireless interface
Number of devices seen by the wireless interface

message.name: CC_DESCRIPTOR
message.description: Used to assign / report a descriptor for a string. This message can be used to assign or report a unique 10 character descriptor which represents a string up to 235 characters long.
message.field: target system ID
target component ID
Timestamp of the request (us)
The descriptor used to represent the string
The string represented by the descriptor
